entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:22 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 1:16 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:35 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 1:35 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 1:35 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
